effect.name: Stereo tools
effect.description: This filter has some handy utilities to manage stereo signals, for converting M/S stereo recordings to L/R signal while having control over the parameters or spreading the stereo image of master track.
effect.author: libavfilter

parameter.name: av.level_in
Level IN
parameter.comment: Set input level before filtering for both channels. Allowed range is from 0.015625 to 64.

parameter.name: av.level_out
Level OUT
parameter.comment: Set input level before filtering for both channels. Allowed range is from 0.015625 to 64.

parameter.name: av.balance_in
Balance IN
parameter.comment: Set input balance between both channels. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.

parameter.name: av.balance_out
Balance OUT
parameter.comment: Set input balance between both channels. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.

parameter.name: av.softclip
Softclip
parameter.comment: Enable softclipping. Results in analog distortion instead of harsh digital 0dB clipping.

parameter.name: av.phasel
Phase Left
parameter.comment: Change the phase of the left channel.

parameter.name: av.phaser
Phase Right
parameter.comment: Change the phase of the right channel.

parameter.name: av.mode
Stereo Mode
parameter.paramlistdisplay: Left/Right to Left/Right,Left/Right to Mid/Side,Mid/Side to Left/Right,Left/Right to Left/Left,Left/Right to Right/Right,Left/Right to Left + Right,Left/Right to Right/Left,Mid/Side to Left/Left,Mid/Side to Right/Right,Mid/Side to Right/Left,Left/Right to Left - Right

parameter.name: av.slevel
Side Level
parameter.comment: Set level of side signal. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 0.015625 to 64.

parameter.name: av.sbalance
Side Balance
parameter.comment: Set balance of side signal. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.

parameter.name: av.mlev
Mid Level
parameter.comment: Set level of the middle signal. Default is 1. Allowed range is from 0.015625 to 64.

parameter.name: av.mpan
Mid Pan
parameter.comment: Set middle signal pan. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.

parameter.name: av.base
Stereo base
parameter.comment: Set stereo base between mono and inverted channels. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -1 to 1.

parameter.name: av.delay
Delay
parameter.comment: Set delay in milliseconds how much to delay left from right channel and vice versa. Default is 0. Allowed range is from -20 to 20.

parameter.name: av.phase
Stereo phase
parameter.comment: Set the stereo phase in degrees.

parameter.name: av.bmode_in
Balance IN
parameter.comment: ‘balance’ Classic balance mode. Attenuate one channel at a time. Gain is raised up to 1. ‘amplitude’ Similar to classic mode above but gain is raised up to 2. ‘power’ Equal power distribution, from -6dB to +6dB range.

parameter.name: av.bmode_out
Balance OUT
parameter.comment: ‘balance’ Classic balance mode. Attenuate one channel at a time. Gain is raised up to 1. ‘amplitude’ Similar to classic mode above but gain is raised up to 2. ‘power’ Equal power distribution, from -6dB to +6dB range.
